item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

Use this code

if(AttackingOn2.playerRights == 2) { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack."); break; } if(playerRights == 2) { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack."); break; }

item.title: [317] How to make admins not able to PK [317]
item.dc:creator: @soulzmusic soulzmusic
item.description:
@soulzmusic wrote:

Hey guys, I’m pretty sure this is in the right place but if it’s not please do not flame me. just ask me to move it and if it is in the right spot

I need help making it so admins in my server can’t PK so they can’t spawn stuff and then own everyone. this is the code I have it only sends the message not stoping them.

if (playerRights < 2) { // Stuff. } else { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack others in the wild!"); }

Read full topic
